homeInfo: All you need is an account to create an event. You can start with a title and your name, with optional description, and you're good to go. After that youâ€™ll be able to share a link with your friends to choose days they can potentially attend your meeting and see which one suits you all the most.

With your event created, you and other attendees will be able to choose days, describe the time they have available and easily keep track of when others could join you. As an owner you can also choose whether to receive email or webhook notifications when attendees update their data, and select the final date when your group will meet.
homeLinkInfo: This is a link to your event. Send it to your group members in order to allow them to select days that fit them best. That's where you can specify your own potential attendance, and where you can choose final event date(s).
name: Your name
